thread.title: Peacemaker loses ear at birthday brawl
thread.title_full: Peacemaker loses ear at birthday brawl

author: Temiloluwa Temiloluwa
title: Peacemaker loses ear at birthday brawl
text:
Tweet 
A man who was trying to make peace among fighters at a birthday-party-turned-royal-rumble has had part of his right ear chopped off. 
The incident which happened at over the weekend Ahaba Imenyi in Isuikwuato Local Government Area, Abia State was shared on facebook by Emenike Iroegbu. 
Sharing photos of the bloodied chopped off earlobe, Iroegbu said: “I gathered that trouble started after the event led to a fight. The funny thing is that, the man whose ear was chopped off only came to separate the fight.” 
It is yet to be known what weapon was used to chop the ear off. 
See the photos below.
